questions: - How do I store collections related to the profile, allowing one-to-many relationships with other objects?
- What is the field in the profile where you store collections related to it?
- How can I enable the storage of one-to-many relationships with other objects in the profile?
answer:
# Where do I store collections related to the profile, allowing the storage of one-to-many relationships with other objects?
You store collections related to the profile, allowing one-to-many relationships with other objects, in
the `collections` field of profile.
